scripts.start: if [ "$APP" = "web" ]; then cd apps/web-v2 && npx next start -p ${PORT:-3000}; elif [ "$APP" = "api" ]; then cd apps/api && node ./dist/main.js; fi
scripts.cleandep: rm -rf node_modules && pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules
scripts.heroku-postbuild: if [ "$APP" = "web" ]; then pnpm run build:web && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm install --prod --frozen-lockfile; elif [ "$APP" = "api" ]; then pnpm run build:api && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm install --prod --frozen-lockfile; else echo 'no valid APP environment variable detected, please set APP to "web" or "api"'; exit 1; fi
